required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of Hetrombopag in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Single-Arm, Open-Label, Self-Controlled, Drug-Drug Interaction Study of Hetrombopag Olamine and Ciclosporin in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, single-arm, open-label, self-controlled, phase I clinical study. A total of 26 male or female healthy subjects are intended to be enrolled to evaluate the PK drug-drug interaction between ciclosporin and hetrombopag.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the plasma hetrombopag concentration vs time curve (AUC0-120)
Area under the plasma hetrombopag concentration vs time curve (AUC0-inf)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Drug Concentration in Plasma After Single Dose (Tmax)
Half-life Associated With the Terminal Slope (t½)
The number of volunteers with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability

arm_group.arm_group_label: D1：hetrombopag single dose，D11-D15：cyclosporine,D16 combination use of hetrombopag and cyclosporine

intervention.description: Drug: Hetrombopag Olamine Tablet Ciclosporin Soft Capsule
intervention.arm_group_label: D1：hetrombopag single dose，D11-D15：cyclosporine,D16 combination use of hetrombopag and cyclosporine

facility.name: West China Second University Hospital Ethics Committee
